column3: What items are suited for aetherial reduction?
Like I said before, it's a method o' reducin' certain items to their base aetherial components. Crystals, mostly, but occasionally other rare materials.
Not just any items, mind─collectables. Ain't easy to get yer hands on such rarities as it is, so ye'd best refer to yer logs to make sure yer lookin' in the right place.
Well...if it ain't a collectable, ye can't reduce it, so there's that.

Also, while any ol' collectable can be reduced, ye'll get far better yields from ones with especially high collectability. 'Course, that means you'll have to part ways with it, but I needn't remind you of the obvious, eh?
